scan.name: scan
scan.summary: Scans all the content from a directory, including the subdirectories

arguments.name: type
arguments.description: The type of item to return ('file', 'dir', default is both)

params.name: $type
params.description: The type of item to return ('file', 'dir', default is both)

scan.comments: /** * Scans all the content from a directory, including the subdirectories * * * bbn\File\Dir::scan("/home/me"); * bbn\File\Dir::delete("C:\Documents\Test"); * * * @param string $dir The directory path. * @param string $type The type of item to return ('file', 'dir', default is both) * * @return array */
